scripts.run-android-with-bundle: npm run preinstall && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res npm install
scripts.run-android-new-port: npm run update-port-android && npm install && react-native run-android
scripts.run-ios-new-port: npm install && npm run update-react-packager-port-ios && react-native run-ios
scripts.run-android: npm run preinstall && npm install && && react-native run-android
scripts.run-ios: npm run preinstall && npm install && && react-native run-ios
